lines.text: He hasn't got his shirt on!
We're English! English, do you understand? This is Australia, yes? Where is Adelaide?
I don't suppose it matters which way we go.
We'll stay here. Perhaps the water will come back.
I expect we're the first white people he's seen.
Please try. It's silly to give in now. It can't be much further.

Water. Drink. We want water to drink. You must understand! Anyone can understand that. We want to drink. I can't make it any simpler. Water. To drink. The water hole has dried up. Where do they keep the water?
